name: Night of the Living Butter
description: This is a short game jam I made over about 4 days for my university. I had bigger plans for this project but time prevented me from doing so. There was supposed to be an entire map with objectives and locked rooms, puzzles, etc. I am hoping to gain feedback on what people think and features they would like implemented into a full game. The graphics are not great, but that would be greatly improved as I have time to make it look better.  If you want to support my endeavors, please donate any amount you want.
